AHF\_LickDetector 
=========================

LickDetector is only implemented for the `MPR121 Capacitive Touch Sensor <https://www.adafruit.com/product/1982>`_, in :code:`AHF_LickDetector_MPR`.

------------------------------------------

.. automodule:: AHF_LickDetector
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

-----------------------------------------------

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
